title: contracts
description: JSON schema for BigQuery table contracts

is_erc20.description: Whether this contract is an ERC20 contract

is_erc721.description: Whether this contract is an ERC721 contract

block_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the block where this contract was created

block_number.description: Block number where this contract was created

block_hash.description: Hash of the block where this contract was created
